alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pinellas and west central Hillsborough Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Macdill Air Force Base, or 8 miles northeast of Downtown Saint Petersburg, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, St. Petersburg, Tampa International Airport, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, Feather Sound, Egypt Lake-Leto, Raymond James Stadium, South Tampa, Soho, University Of Tampa, Weedon Island State Preserve, Venetian Isles, Davis Islands, Vinoy Park, Snell Isle, Crescent Lake and Peter O Knight Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
